story.storykicker: Bank of India is hiring, apply now for 517 posts.
story.storybody:
Bank of India, Mumbai has issued a notification inviting applications from interested, eligible candidates for recruitment to 517 posts of officers and managers.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 517

Name of the posts:

  • Officer -Credit: 217
  • Manager: 200
  • Senior Manager: 100
Eligibility criteria:

 

Educational qualification:

The interested candidates should have a B.com degree (3 year full time programme) with minimum 60 per cent marks, from a recognised university/institute. Apart from a degree they should also have done MBA/PGDBM/PGDBA from institute of repute (two/three year full time programme) (candidates appearing in the final year of examination of MBA/PGDBM/PGDBA are eligible to apply. However, their final result should be declared on or before 31th August 2016.) OR

They should be a Chartered Accountant OR ICWA

Selection procedure:

The candidates will be selected on the basis of their performance in a written exam and an interview.

Pay scale:

Officer -Credit: The selected candidate will draw a salary from the pay band of 23700-980/7-30560-1145/2-32850-1310/7-42020

Manager: The selected candidate will draw a salary from the pay band of 31705-1145/1- 32850-1310/10 - 45950

Senior Manager: The selected candidate will draw a salary from the pay band of 42020-1310/5-48570-1460/2-51490

Age limit:

Officer -Credit: The minimum age of the applicant should not be less than 21 years and must not exceed 30 years, as on April 04, 2016.

Manager: The minimum age of the applicant should not be less than 28 years and must not exceed 35 years, as on April 04, 2016.

Senior Manager: The minimum age of the applicant should not be less than 30 years and must not exceed 38 years, as on April 04, 2016.

Age relaxation as per government rules would be applicable.

How to apply:

Interested, eligible candidates will have to apply online only.

Application fees:

The candidates have to pay an application fee of Rs 600 online . The candidates belonging to the SC/ST/PWD category need to pay Rs 100 towards the charges.

Important date:

Last date for submission of an online application form is June 14, 2016
